flavorText:
"Some secrets want to be revealed. They burst through the soil of their own accord."
—Dindun of Kulrath Mine

foreignData.flavorText: „Manche Geheimnisse wollen einfach aufgedeckt werden. Sie bohren sich einfach aus eigenem Antrieb an die Oberfläche durch." —Dindun aus der Kulrathmine
foreignData.name: Fossilienfund
foreignData.text: Bringe eine zufällig bestimmte Karte aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück und sortiere dann deinen Friedhof, wie du willst.

foreignData.flavorText: "Algunos secretos quieren ser revelados. Brotan del suelo por voluntad propia." —Dindun de la mina de Kulrath
foreignData.name: Encontrar un fósil
foreignData.text: Regresa a tu mano una carta al azar de tu cementerio, luego reordena tu cementerio como quieras.

foreignData.flavorText: « Certains secrets veulent être révélés. Ils jaillissent du sol par eux-mêmes. » —Dindun de la mine de Kulrajh
foreignData.name: Découverte fossile
foreignData.text: Renvoyez une carte au hasard de votre cimetière dans votre main, puis réorganisez votre cimetière comme vous le désirez.

foreignData.flavorText: "Alcuni segreti vogliono essere rivelati. Emergono dal terreno di propria volontà." —Dindun della Miniera di Kulrath
foreignData.name: Ritrovamento di Fossili
foreignData.text: Riprendi in mano una carta a caso dal tuo cimitero, poi riordina a tua scelta il tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 「明かされるのを待っている秘密もあるのさ。 そいつは自分の意思で土の下から飛び出してくるんだ。」 ――クルラス鉱山のディンダン
foreignData.name: 化石の発見
foreignData.text: あなたの墓地にあるカードを１枚無作為に選び、それをあなたの手札に加える。その後、あなたの墓地をあなたが望む順番に並べ替える。

foreignData.flavorText: "Alguns segredos querem ser revelados. Eles explodem no solo voluntariamente." — Dindun, da Mina de Kulrath
foreignData.name: Encontrar Fóssil
foreignData.text: Devolva um card aleatoriamente de seu cemitério para sua mão e depois reorganize seu cemitério como quiser.

foreignData.flavorText: «Некоторые тайны жаждут разглашения. Они вырываются из почвы по собственному желанию». — Диндан с приисков Кулрата
foreignData.name: Находка Окаменелостей
foreignData.text: Верните случайно выбранную карту из вашего кладбища в вашу руку, затем измените порядок карт в вашем кладбище по вашему усмотрению.

foreignData.flavorText: 「有些秘密想要被揭露。 它们是自愿从土壤冒出来的。」 ～库拉斯矿脉的丁顿
foreignData.name: 寻找化石
foreignData.text: 随机将一张牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后你以任意顺序来排列你的坟墓场。

name: Fossil Find
originalText: Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand, then reorder your graveyard as you choose.

rulings.text: The easiest way to choose a card at random from your graveyard is to turn your graveyard face down, shuffle it, and pick a card. You’re not normally allowed to reorder your graveyard, but since this card lets you do it anyway, it’s okay to mix the cards up while you’re picking randomly.

If you have multiple cards in your graveyard with the same name, and one of them is being targeted by another spell on the stack or enchanted (with Spellweaver Volute, for example), you must differentiate them so you know which one (if any) is chosen at random. In that case, it may be better to use dice to choose a card at random, or temporarily use a proxy card to represent the targeted card.

Except for the card that you return to your hand, reordering your graveyard won’t affect anything that’s currently targeting or enchanting a card in your graveyard. Whatever it is will be able to track the card it’s targeting or enchanting as your graveyard is reordered.
All players get to see which card you chose at random.

text: Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand, then reorder your graveyard as you choose.
